data.title: Prime Video: Mad Max
data.meta_description: In this inventive, violent action movie, the chase sequences are brilliant and the stunts terrific. Mel Gibson plays a mean and moody but heroic cop who's out to avenge the brutal murder of his family by rebel bikers, against a backdrop of a bleak post-nuclear future.
data.text:
Mad Max

In this inventive, violent action movie, the chase sequences are brilliant and the stunts terrific. Mel Gibson plays a mean and moody but heroic cop who's out to avenge the brutal murder of his family by rebel bikers, against a backdrop of a bleak post-nuclear future.

IMDb 6.81 h 33 min1979

18+
